text: Imran Ahmed Khan Sherwani (born 9 April 1962) is a British former international field hockey player. He was born in Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire, England. Sherwani won gold with the Great Britain squad at the 1988 Summer Olympics. In June 2021, Sherwani revealed that he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:British ice hockey players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Great Britain Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire Category:People with Alzheimer's disease
title: Imran Sherwani
